short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to fetch and display UBC course and professor statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A useful chrome extension that anyone can use to get a quick overview of the course they are viewing on UBC Workday, and ease the many Workday headaches. 

It provides:
ðŸ”· Average grade information on a course from UBC Grades
ðŸ”· Average professor rating information from Rate My Professor

How to use it (easy as 1, 2, 3) :
1. Download the extension from the Chrome Webstore with the link above
2. Click on the extensions button on the top right and pin the extension 
3. Click on the extension icon whenever you are on a course page to reveal the stats!
